results.t: VEGAN | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary

results.p: Veganism is a philosophy and way of living which seeks to exclude—as far as is possible and practicable—all forms of exploitation of, and cruelty to, animals.

results.p: At Vegan Action, we certify products as vegan so you can make better choices for the animals, for the environment, and for your health.
